summary:
This mod adds a new, small, lore-friendly house, perfect for rollplayers.
<br />Its create for Khajit, how I imagin a little house in Elswyer would looks like.
<br />It comes with crafting & cooking stations, storage room, one bed and a lot of modder resources.
descriptionHtml:
[center][u][/u][/center][center][b][font=Georgia][color=#660000][size=5]Raj'dya[/size][/color][/font][/b]
<br />[color=#900000]
<br />[/color][font=Georgia][color=#660000][size=4][color=#5B0F00]The Khajit Themed Playerhome[/color]

<br />[/color][color=#ffffff][color=#e06666]This [font=Georgia]mod adds a new, small, lore-friendly house, perfect for rollplayers.
<br />Its create for Khajit, how I imagin a little house in Elswyer would looks like.
<br />It comes with crafting & cooking stations, storage room, one bed and a lot of modder resources. [/font][/color]

<br />[font=Georgia][u][b][color=#ffd966][size=4]:Why its so small?:[/size][/color][/b][/u][/font]
<br />[color=#ffd966][size=3]
<br />[font=Georgia]Cats love small boxes and corners, they let them feel safe and protectet.
<br />And Khajit are cats, whats why I make it so cat fitting :3[/font][/size][/color]
